presentation.title: Accommodation
presentation.headline: Morning coffee at Roșia Montană?
presentation.description:
Rooms, camping, bookings!
Our house is a heritage building, recently restored, in the historic center of Roșia Montană. See images and more...

metaData.title: Accommodation at Casa Petri Rosia Montana
metaData.description: Stay in a heritage house from the Historic Center of Roșia Montana, recently renovated with bathrooms and kitchen access. See also the hiking and bike trails to discover our area: roman galleries, gold mining industry, heritage buildings, mountains, lakes and many more. Rosia Montana, Alba, Apuseni Mountains, Transylvania - Romania.

specificArticles.textContent: We are located in the historic center of Rosia Montana 331. The building was a bank, medical center, cinema and then it was bought by our grandparents who work in mining industry, and used for living. It's a heritage building, so we preserved the painting, the wooden floor, the windows, the heating with terracotta stoves, but we also added new bathrooms and kitchen. Te rooms have separate entries connected by a yard with hammocks, green grass and a nice view to the Cânic massif.

specificArticles.title: Books apartment
specificArticles.textContent:
Has one meter wide walls made of rocks, a closet filled with books, two bunk beds and an expandable couch. Is at the ground floor and has private entrance.
persons - free wifi - private bathroom - private kitchenette - library

images.text: Books apartment - We transformed a cupboard into a library with old books, guides about Rosia Montana and board games.
Books apartment -  In the showcase are old photos from Roșia, crystal clusters rocks and old objects used in the household.
Books apartment - bathroom heated with electric boiler

specificArticles.title: Little house apartment
specificArticles.textContent:
The garden house has one room with two beds, bathroom, kitchen and private entrance.
persons - free wifi - private bathroom - private kitchen - library

images.text: Little house apartment - the beds can be joined
Little house apartment - the library contains maps, books and guides about Roșia Montană
Little house apartment - the entrance in the private bathroom and kitchen are directly from the room. The heating is done by a terracotta stove on woods.
Little house apartment - kitchen (fridge, microwave, hob, sink with hot and cold water, dishes and cutlery)
Little house apartment - bathroom with electric boiler.
Little house apartment - the outside - private entrance.

specificArticles.title: The Upstairs apartment
specificArticles.textContent:
It is located at the first floor, has private entrance and the access is made through a hallway with stairs and many small windows called 'târnaț' (specific to our area).
persons - free wifi - private bathroom - private kitchenette - library

images.text: The Upstairs apartment - the double bed can be separated. The painting was made in 1960 and is very well preserved
The Upstairs apartment - a relaxing area with a chic coffee table and many places with old books.
The Upstairs apartment - we transformed an old door into a library.
The Upstairs apartment - places with old books, vinyls and newspapers and magazines about Rosia Montana.
The Upstairs apartment - bathroom heated with electric boiler.

specificArticles.textContent: Photos from our yard or around the house.

images.text: Our yard - We have some hammocks to rest after a long hike, read, enjoy the Cârnic view or surf on the internet (there is wifi too).
Our yard - The pavilion is the perfect place for chatting, drinking 'țuica' or to eat before going out for a hike.
Our yard - We have a film projector, so we can watch images and movies about Roșia Montana.
Casa Petri - view from the street.
Beside the house is a playground for children.
Visit us also on winter! Beside the house we have a perfect spot for sleighing.

specificArticles.textContent: Because we also love camping, we prepared a small camping place in our yard, for maximum 4 tents, with bathroom, kitchen, dinning area, gazebo, hammocks, free wifi and electricity.

images.text: Camping area fro the yard
Camping area fro the yard

specificArticles.textContent: Each apartment has a small kitchen and we also have a barbecue in the garden where you can cook. Our reccomandation is to eat at the locals who offers homemade meals - specify in the bellow bookings form and we will send you more details. Beside the house are 3 grocery stores (~5min away) -

seeAlso.text: see here how to reach them from Casa Petri...

specificArticles.textContent: We want to have everything set for your arrival so please make an early reservation. For larger groups or longer periods we can offer discounts.
